FuncDef: The display bgp rpd routing-table command displays information about routes in the BGP RPD address family.
Examples: Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
Network                        Peer           MED        LocPrf    PrefVal Path/Ogn
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp rpd routing-table command displays information about routes in the BGP RPD address family.
